title: CBC Radio
text:
With only two weeks left before the election, six federal party leaders will face off in an English language debate today from 7 p.m. to 9 p.m. ET.

CBC Radio is providing coverage of the federal leaders' debate live from the Museum of History in Gatineau, Que., in a special program hosted by Chris Hall and Susan Bonner.

Evan Dyer will provide fact checking, and a panel of political strategists will offer their analysis during a 30-minute post-debate program.

You can listen to the debate live here.

Panelists:
description: CBC Radio is streaming live coverage of the federal leaders debate. The special is hosted by Chris Hall and Susan Bonner. Evan Dyer will provide fact checking, and a panel of political strategists will offer their analysis during a 30-minute post-debate program.
